body_html:
@ezyang Sure! Thanks for letting me know.

I think it's really dependent on how you get the pybind in your system and what's the version of it.

INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES was added 2 years ago to pybind:

https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/534b756cb3244aca959359c07d44e4fed3498ba8/tools/pybind11Config.cmake.in#L87

@xuhdev Will you be able to provide more detail about your system? Such as what's the OS distribution, which cmake version are you using, and where did you get the pybind and its version?

IMHO it's caused by using a very old pybind version, but in case there's any special OS dist that change the default behavior, it's better to add a fallback path instead of replacement.
